name: execute_sql_command
description: Execute a SQL command on a SQLite database. Supports SELECT/INSERT/UPDATE, exporting result to file, or storing in a temp table.

database_path.description: Absolute path to the SQLite database file

query.description: SQL query to execute (can be SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, etc.)

save_to_file.description: Optional: Path to save SELECT result (.csv or .xlsx). Ignored if not a SELECT query

create_temp_table.description: Optional: Name of a temporary table to store SELECT results in the same database
